name: BENCMATE Inflatable Dog Cone Collar Alternative, Soft Dog Cone for Small Medium Large Dogs and Cats, Neck Recovery ECollar Donut Collar After Surgery (Medium, Blue)
short_description: COMFORTABLE FOR YOUR PET - While wearing the BENCMATE Collar, the inflatable function and the soft outside material will let your dog wear it comfortably and it does not block your pet’s vision, they can eat, drink, sleep and play at ease while staying protected.

DESIGNED TO LAST - The protective dog cone is not just soft and washable but also featured scratch and bite resistance. It will not mark, scrape or damage your furniture. The materials we selected are meant for durable and long-lasting use. You can insert your pet’s everyday collar through the inner ring loops for stabilization.

PROTECTIVE AND GENTLE CARING - The dog cone alternative after surgery is designed to protect your pets from injuries, rashes, and post-surgery wounds, it will prevent pets from biting and licking their injured area or surgical site and promote recovery from surgery or wounds. The comfortable material also provides gentle caring for your pets.

ADJUSTABLE AND EASY STORING - You can easily adjust the collar strap for a perfect fit and put the strap side at the back of your dog’s neck in case of biting. Deflating and storing is also handy, store it in a small space for space-saving, and there is a zipper opening on one side, you can take the bag out and wash the outside cloth.

USEFUL TIPS - ①Measurement differences may exist, hence BENCMATE sincerely recommends you measure your pet’s neck circumference before purchasing to get a perfect size. ②If the dog cone is a bit large for your dog and easily falls off, please try to loop the daily collar with the recovery collar, it would be helpful to prevent the collar from falling off.

name: BINGPET Cat Cone Collars Soft,Cat Recovery E Collars After Surgery to Stop Licking,Waterproof Adjustable Elizabeth Neck Cones Cute Pet Donut Pillow for Cats Kitten Puppy Wound Healing After Surgery,S
short_description: Adjustable Fit & Secure Protection for Cats: BINGPET soft cat recovery collar achieve a perfect fit for your cat with the easy-adjust drawstring, Small size designed for cats 4-10 lbs with neck sizes under 9.4 inches (9.8" diameter collar). The secure closure and optional inner loops allow attachment to your cat's regular collar for added stability, preventing escapes. Measure your cat’s neck before ordering

Focuses on Upper Body Wound Care & Recovery: Designed to prevent licking and scratching, BINGPET soft e-collar for cats and kitten help wounds and surgical sites on the upper body heal safely and faster. It's a great aid for recovery, grooming, or after vet visits. Important: To ensure effectiveness, please check your pet's wound location. This collar is most suitable for the neck, back, or sides, and may not fully restrict access to paws or lower limbs.

Pillow-Soft Comfort Fabric: Made with a breathable outer layer and ultra-soft PP cotton filling, BINGPET cat recovery collars is supremely soft and lightweight. It prevents overheating and skin irritation, while its plush build doubles as a built-in pillow to help your cat rest comfortably and recover peacefully

No More Struggles with Eating or Drinking: This cat cone offers a clear line of sight and freedom of movement. Unlike restrictive plastic cones, your cat can use our soft cone comfortably eat, drink, play, and rest as usual, reducing stress and making daily life during recovery feel normal for both of you

Easy to Clean & Maintain: Crafted with a waterproof surface, the cone for cats resists stains and pet hair. Simply wipe clean with a damp cloth. The sturdy material withstands scratching and chewing, offering long-lasting use with minimal maintenance. Inner loops allow secure attachment to your cat’s regular collar for added stability. Our soft cat cone turn recovery time into a cute photo opportunity!

name: Cat Cone Collar Soft Elizabethan Collar for Surgery Recovery - Adjustable for Small and Large Cats Kittens to Stop Licking
short_description: Durable and Comfortable Protection - This cat cone serves as a cozy protective shield around your cat's neck, effectively deterring them from biting or licking injured areas or surgical sites. It's designed for both short-term use to facilitate post-operative wound healing and suture retention, as well as long-term use to prevent anxious biting or licking behaviors.

Premium Soft EPE Material - Unlike traditional rigid plastic Elizabethan collars for cats, our soft cat cone is crafted from EPE material, offering a cushioned effect when compressed or bumped. Its breathability ensures pet comfort during daily wear, while the lightweight design is so unobtrusive that your pet may forget they're even wearing it, allowing for normal eating and sleeping.

Adjustable for a Secure Fit - To address concerns about the cat recovery collar slipping or being removed, our design includes an adjustable strap that can be customized to fit your pet's neck size. Remember to secure it with a knot after adjusting to ensure a snug and safe fit.

Vision-Friendly Folding Edges - Understanding how pets dislike bulky cones that impede movement, our e collar for cats features a folding edge design that won't obstruct your cat's vision like traditional collars. This allows your cat to continue chasing butterflies, hummingbirds, and grasshoppers with ease while wearing the pet cone.

Warm Reminder - Before purchasing this post-surgical cat cone after surgery, please measure your kitten's neck girth carefully, ensuring the length of your cat's head is less than the depth of the kitten cone. If you have any further inquiries, don't hesitate to reach out. We wholeheartedly wish your pet a swift and comfortable recovery.
